responses.rationale: The segment reports the location of cases, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics in the sense described by Q9.
The segment reports the number of birds on a specific farm with confirmed cases, not economic data or metrics as defined by Q9.
The segment reports the number of states with cases, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics as defined by Q9.
The segment discusses the cause of spread, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
Reports annual production volume ('raises about 11.7 million turkeys annually') using a standard verb.
Reports number of chickens on farms ('had 46 million chickens') using a standard verb and production status ('leading egg producer').
Reports number of birds killed ('having to kill about 13 million chickens and 305,000 turkeys') using standard language.
Reports total number of birds killed ('have had to kill about 22 million birds') and breakdown using standard language.
Reports number of birds killed ('forcing the killing of 5.3 million hens and 88,000 turkeys') using standard language.
